doubleClick.label: DoubleClick
doubleClick.description: DoubleClick for Publishers (DFP) Video provides publishers with a platform to increase revenue from video advertising as well as manage costs. Fully integrated with DFP, publishers can now manage their entire display advertising through one platform, with video at its core. Learn more about DFP video solutions

adTagUrl.label: Ad tag URL
adTagUrl.doc: The DoubleClick DFP VAST ad tag URL (can include multiple nested VAST URLs).

enableCountDown.label: Enable notice message
enableCountDown.doc: When checked, a notice message displays during ad playback

pauseAdOnClick.label: Pause ad on clicked
pauseAdOnClick.doc: When checked, the ad pauses when the user clicks on it

countdownText.label: Notice message
countdownText.doc: Notice message to be displayed during ad playback. Can contain evaluated expressions using curly brackets

contentId.doc: The contentId, used by DoubleClick plugin API, generally the entry ID, but can also be custom metadata mapping

customParams.doc: Custom parameters passed to the DoubleClick adTag URL. Should be listed as URL parameterss key=value&key2=value2 pairs.

cmsId.label: CMS id
cmsId.doc: The CMS id, appended to the VAST url, used by DoubleClick plugin api

disableCompanionAds.doc: determine if companion ads should be disabled.

htmlCompanions.label: HTML Companions
htmlCompanions.doc: Companions list. For each companion please specify the ad container div id and the expected ad width and height.

adsManagerLoadedTimeout.doc: Timer for timed checking if adsManager was loaded(in milliseconds)

leadWithFlash.label: Lead with flash
leadWithFlash.doc: If the flash based DFP runtime should be used where flash is available.

debugMode.label: Debug mode
debugMode.doc: If the DFP IMA3 SDK debug mode should be used.
